All Games > Action Games > ROCKETSROCKETSROCKETS
Community Hub
ROCKETSROCKETSROCKETS
ROCKETS fire ROCKETS at ROCKETS in this action-arcade, arena-combat, gorgeous festival-of-fireworks! It's dogfighting meets figure-skating in space with local multiplayer and single-player fast-paced action modes plus a ZEN MODE where ROCKETS learn to LOVE.
User reviews: Very Positive (423 reviews) - 83% of the 423 user reviews for this game are positive.
Release Date: May 1, 2015

Reviews

“People sat down and played that movement demo for hours on end, and it was just the beginning. The game is fast, frenzied, and gorgeous even in these early stages. With a bit more polish, it could become as addictive as Towerfall and Nidhogg.”
Hardcore Gamer

“I’m ga-ga for rockets.”
Big Sushi

“The agility of these rockets belongs in the Luftrausers universe, where survival is only possible if you can stall your plane's engines and turn on a dime in mid-flight. Get to grips with that and you can dance.”
Kill Screen

About This Game

ROCKETS ROCKETS ROCKETS is a game where you fly ROCKETS that rocket ROCKETS at other ROCKETS ! The ultimate rush of arcade arena action, with the fluidity and amazing feel of soaring through space.

SHOW ME THE FEATURES

  • ROCKETS. We feature only the finest interstellar vehicles.
  • LOCAL VERSUS MULTIPLAYER. Get your fellow rocketeers together, we're going to BLOW THINGS UP!
  • UNDERDOG MODE. A flock of rockets versus the lone rebel. Amongst all the friendly fire, will you rocket to the top?
  • TEAM PLAY. Every rocket needs a partner!
  • STANLEY. This is a story of a rocket named Stanley. Meet the AI Rocket that thinks he has free will, and meet the rockets he will relentlessly fire at your rocket.
  • COOL LIGHT TRAILS. These are some classy rockets that are a lot of fun to fly.
  • ALL THE CONTROLLERS. In addition to full keyboard support, we currently support dozens of different controllers, and are always adding more!
  • MAKE IT YOUR OWN. We've got a glorious settings menu where you can turn on different game modes, tweak weapon behaviours, alter gravity, and even adjust sprite sizes!
  • MODDING. Dig into our data files and edit yourself up a new game mode!

Really, though, the game is about intimacy . Check out Zen mode, it's wonderful with a loved-one!

DELUXE PACK


The deluxe pack includes the full game, the soundtrack, and two exclusive bonus MP3s!
READ MORE

4min of this game
YouTube™ Video: 4min of ROCKETSROCKETSROCKETS - highlights 
Views: 60
here is the review for this game on steam http://steamcommunity.com/id/blinkdoggie/recommended/289760


There are 3 modes zen, quick, and tournament
In zen you fly around and you can make your jets leave behind 1 of 4 colors to make pictures or just cem. trails.
In quick you can play against up to 3 other ai or local humans.
In tournament you can only play with upto 3 other local humans but you can set the terms of vicroty.

Your rocket has a forward shot, a light charge that drops behind you and explodes after a second, a bomb you can drop from the bottom of your rocket (the top & bottom of the rocket look the same), & a shield.
You can hit yourself so watch but it mostly be from the bombs.
You win by hitting the other rockets and making them lose all 3 of the little orbs around them (tournament has other victory conditions)

Cpt Awesome
198 products in account
4 reviews
Recommended
3.2 hrs on record
Posted: July 13
Ill be honest, I bought this game with the intent to try it out and then return it. What i experienced when i booted up that first game instantly changed that. This is a phenominally simple game, but it is SO MUCH FUN.

    Pros:
  • Killer Soundtrack.
  • Simplistic and beautiful.
  • Easy to grasp controls.
  • Amazing game for couch co-op or multiplayer.
  • Intense Dogfights. Like Intense!
  • Incredibly Fun!

    Cons:
  • There isnt a whole lot of variety, theres one level and one mode(with the addition of a "Zen" aka drawing mode and a tournament mode, that facillitates that play style but isnt a unique gmae mode)
  • Nothing to spice up the level, yeah the slow down and speed up drops are cool, but they dont change the game in anyway, just make it slower or faster. I'd like to see some special one use weapons or shields drop occasionally.
  • In my opinion, the camera comes in close to quickly, its a bit jarring durin the fight and distracting.
Overal, It impressed me enough that Radial Games can keep my money. Definitely a great game to play with friends.

TL;DR Great Game, Great soundtrack. Little lacking on Content. 7/10 Buy this game.

Squire Zed
2,478 products in account
11 reviews
Recommended
6.9 hrs on record
Posted: August 14
ROCKETSROCKETSROCKETS is hands down the most entertaining way to get carpal tunnel playing couch co-op. It has beautiful aesthetics and is quite enjoyable to play with a friend, against the AI, or even in the more pacifist Zen mode flying around and making art with rocket trails. The combat is simple, intuitive, and amazing, with three projectiles and a dash maneuver which allow for diverse gameplay. You can shoot missles, leave nasty mines, and drop bombs to cause beautiful, beautiful havoc. I'm not kidding. It's quite beautiful watching the brightly colored projectiles and stages blossom with bright, cheerful explosions as your enemies spin, hit by your barrage of missles and bombs or blasted by a mine. There is a lot of potential for skill, but even beginners can play without too much barrier.

Pros:
Fun gameplay
Beautiful (minimalist) graphics
Great game modes
Couch versus, co-op vs bots, and Zen mode

Cons:
High risk of intense button mashing, play at your own risk.
No online multiplayer (and, given the intense speed of matches, it makes sense, though it would be amazing if it existed)
Basically requires a controller- playable on keyboard and mouse, but much less fun.

I highly recommend this game if you have a friend nearby or just want to relax and unwind against a bot or in Zen mode.
